EmailTemplate.name: 2017 Eagle Copters Invitation.2017 Eagle Copters Invitation to Customer Event
EmailTemplate.subject: We're Celebrating Another 407HP Conversion at HELI-EXPO 2017!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're Celebrating Another Eagle 407HP Conversion at HELI-EXPO 2017!
Eagle Copters and Honeywell cordially invite you to join us for a complimentary cocktail hour at HELI-EXPO 2017. We're celebrating the signing of Helicopter Express, our latest 407HP customer.
Eagle Copters' Cocktail Hour: Date: Wednesday, March 8th Time: 3 p.m. Location: Eagle Copters Booth #8540
Attention Bell 407 Operators!
Stop by the Eagle Copters booth #8540 or the Honeywell booth #5423 for a chance to win a FREE Honeywell Sky Connect Tracker III <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/sky-connect-tracker-systems]]>, FREE Sky Connect Tracking Services <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/brochures/n61-1465-000-001-skyconnecttrackingsystem-bro.pdf]]> or a FREE Truth Data License <[[http://www.truthdata.net/]]>! We would like to learn more about the 407s in your fleet. The drawing will be held during the Eagle Copters' cocktail hour on March 8th at 3:00 P.M. You must be present to win.
